page.title: 14STRAWBERRY GROWING
page.content: ONCE THE CROP IS READY,A TIME WHICH MAY BE FROM EARLY JUNE TO LATE JULY DEPENDING ON THE WEATHER,TEAMS OF PICKERS SPEND MOST OF THE DAY IN THE FIELDS. THIS WILL ENSURE THAT THE CROP IS SELECTED AT ITS BEST. ALTHOUGH THERE ARE MANY SMALLHOLDINGS WHICH PRODUCE THE CROP,IN RECENT YEARS SOME LARGER AREAS HAVE BEEN UTILISED IN AN ATTEMPT TO PRODUCE A BETTER CROP.ONE FAMILY HAVE BEEN ABLE TO NEGOTIATE TO SUPPLY A NATIONAL CHAIN STORE GROUP AND THIS HAS RESULTED IN A MORE SCIENTIFIC METHOD OF PICKING AND PACKAGING.THE CROP IS PICKED,THE TEMPERATURE OF THE FRUIT IS REDUCED,IT IS PACKAGED AND THEN THE TEMPERATURE IS LOWERED STILL FURTHER. THE FRUIT IS THEN COLLECTED AND TAKEN AWAY FOR SALE.
